org.numenta.nupic.network.Region

      Methods in org.numenta.nupic.network that return Region 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Region Region.add(Layer<?> l)
      Adds the specified Layer to this Region.
      Region Region.close()
      Closes the Region and completes the finalization of its assembly.
      (package private) Region Region.connect(Region inputRegion)
      Connects the output of the specified Region to the input of this Region
      Region Region.connect(java.lang.String toLayerName, java.lang.String fromLayerName)
      Connects two layers to each other in a unidirectional fashion with "toLayerName" representing the receiver or "sink" and "fromLayerName" representing the sender or "source".
      static Region Network.createRegion(java.lang.String name)
      Creates and returns a child Region of this Network
      Region Region.getDownstreamRegion()
      Returns the Region that receives this Region's output.
      Region Network.getHead()
      Returns the top-most (last in execution order from bottom to top) Region in this Network
      Region Layer.getRegion()
      Returns the parent Region
      Region Network.getSensorRegion()
      Returns a reference to the Region which contains the Sensor
      Region Network.getTail()
      Returns the bottom-most (first in execution order from bottom to top) Region in this Network
      Region Region.getUpstreamRegion()
      Returns this Region's upstream region, if it exists.
      Region Network.lookup(java.lang.String regionName)
      Returns the Region with the specified name or null if it doesn't exist within this Network
      Region Region.postDeSerialize()
      FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
      Region Region.preSerialize()
      FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
      Methods in org.numenta.nupic.network that return types with arguments of type Region 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Region> Network.getRegions()
      Returns a List view of the contained Regions.
      java.util.Iterator<Region> Network.iterator()
      Returns a Iterator capable of walking the tree of regions from the root Region down through all the child Regions.
      Methods in org.numenta.nupic.network with parameters of type Region 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a Region to this Network

      Connects the output of the specified Region to the input of this Region
      void Layer.setRegion(Region r)
      Sets the parent region which contains this Layer
      void Network.setSensorRegion(Region r)
      Sets a reference to the Region which contains the Sensor (if any).
